attributes.action: Provide specific support for the UK Aviation industry
attributes.additional_details: Aviation workers are facing mass redundancies when the CJRS ends on October 31st. Recently, Manchester Airport Group announced hundreds of redundancies at Manchester, Stansted & East Midlands Airports - one of the reasons they cited was the total lack of sector specific support for Aviation. I want urgent action so that even at this late stage, hundreds of jobs can be saved.
attributes.background: I want the Govt to provide urgent, specific support for the UK Aviation Sector. This can include extending the CJRS or adapting the new CJSS.
